subject: Harness Racing
Horse Racing
Hambletonian (Harness Race)
lead_paragraph: Yannick Gingras drove Pinkman and Mission Brief to wins in the elimination races earlier on the card but chose Mission Brief for harness racing’s biggest event — and narrowly lost.
snippet: Yannick Gingras drove Pinkman and Mission Brief to wins in the elimination races earlier on the card but chose Mission Brief for harness racing’s biggest event — and narrowly lost.
